surname Lan
blue/indigo plant
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Lanshan county in Yongzhou 永州[Yong3 zhou1], Hunan
(bird species of China) azure tit (Cyanistes cyanus)

sentences.english: One Blue Mountain with cream and sugar.
sentences.chinese: 一杯加奶加糖的蓝山咖啡。

sentences.english: I like to call a Blue Mountain Cafe, I often go there.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢一个叫蓝山的咖啡馆，我经常去那里。

sentences.english: That's the sound of steam bursting from the Earth at Nevada Geothermal's Blue Mountain project.
sentences.chinese: 这是来自内华达州蓝山地热项目的滚滚蒸汽迸发声。

sentences.english: Dan Barber, Owner and Executive Chef, Blue Hill restaurants
sentences.chinese: 丹巴贝尔，蓝山餐厅的所有者和行政总厨。

sentences.english: A group of teenagers go to a school camp in the Blue Mountains in Australia .
sentences.chinese: 组的青少年前往难民营的一所学校的蓝山在澳大利亚。

sentences.english: I like to visit the Blue Mountain Cafe, I go often (there).
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢访问蓝山咖啡，我经常去。

sentences.english: Mist shrouds the wrinkled peaks of the Blue Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 薄雾笼罩着蓝山层叠的山峰。

sentences.english: I'm going hiking in the Blue Mountains with your mother.
sentences.chinese: 我打算和你妈妈一起到蓝山去远足旅行。

sentences.english: Blue Mountain coffee has a very clean taste, with a noticable sweetness.
sentences.chinese: 蓝山咖啡有着非常纯正的口味，而且带着甜味。

sentences.english: Jamaican Blue Mountain and Kona coffees have geographic certifications.
sentences.chinese: 牙买加的蓝山和科纳咖啡都有地理证明。

sentences.english: The fact is they have not gotten any permission to market and they have not been processing Blue Mountain coffee.
sentences.chinese: 事实是，他们没有得到许可，也没有加工过蓝山咖啡。
